short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display flag icons to Wikipedia languages list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display flag icons to Wikipedia languages list. Updated to 2023 Wikipedia layout.

List of wikis supported:
wikipedia.org, wikimedia.org, wiktionary.org, wikibooks.org, wikidata.org, wikinews.org, wikiquote.org, wikisource.org, wikiversity.org, wikivoyage.org

This extension is open-source and you can contribute to make it better on GitHub:
https://github.com/DavideViolante/Wikipedia-Flag-Icons
